name: The rhum and damage done
description:
Alcool abuse is quite common when you're a pirate ! 

Unfortunatly it can have hazardous effects on your perception.
Stay focus and get the maximum amout of gold.

⚠️ The game does not posess an EXIT button (we were too busy trying being smart to add one). Just kill it with alt+f4 or something when you're done playing  (sorry for the inconvenience, we'll probably add one in another release, along with the lootboxes).
